text: <@UBP8QFLBY> Is it going to be typeset in the same beautiful way as the first book (Algorithms for Opt)? The first book is literally pretty to look at. I keep it on my coffee table at all times.

elements.text: Is it going to be typeset in the same beautiful way as the first book (Algorithms for Opt)? The first book is literally pretty to look at. I keep it on my coffee table at all times.

text: Thanks! Yep, we used the same template. But, now the code is typeset in JuliaMono!
